caption: Relating to the display of flags in public schools.
summary: This bill restricts flag displays in Texas public schools to only specific authorized flags, including flags of foreign countries. Chinese flags would be allowed as they fall under the "foreign country" category. The bill allows parents to take legal action if schools violate these restrictions, requiring schools to remedy violations within 10 business days of receiving written notice.
translation: 该法案限制德克萨斯州公立学校只能展示特定的授权旗帜，其中包括外国国旗。中国国旗作为"外国"国旗是被允许展示的。如果学校违反这些限制规定，家长可以采取法律行动，学校必须在收到书面通知后的10个工作日内纠正违规行为。
